metadata.title: CVE-2024-0727 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Processing a maliciously formatted PKCS12 file may lead OpenSSL to crashleading to a potential Denial of Service attack

criterions.comment: openssl package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
nodejs package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
edk2 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
